sentence.Network_en: Alluvial soils usually grow the best crops.
sentence.Network_cn: 淤积土壤通常能长出最好的庄稼。

sentence.Network_en: Thus, alluvial channel flows are simultaneously sculptor and sculpture.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样, 冲积河槽水流既是塑造者,同时又是被塑造者.

sentence.Network_en: The water cuts the alluvial banks of the " lower " river into deep horseshoe curves.
sentence.Network_cn: 河水把下游那些 冲积 的河岸冲成很深的马蹄形曲线.

...con>冲积锥编辑又称洪积锥、沟谷口形成的半圆锥形堆积体、它是由暂时性流水作用形成的堆积地貌、冲积锥(alluvial cone)由于沟谷水流流速较大，被搬运的物质被带到沟口附近，由于坡度减小，流速降低，加之水流开始分散，发生大量堆积而成半圆锥形堆积体。冲积锥的规模不大，其顶部和.

entry.def: Alluvial soils are soils which consist of earth and sand left behind on land which has been flooded or where a river once flowed.
